attributes.action: Issue royal mail delivery people with scam mail alert forms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IN ORDER TO GET HELP TO THE THOUSANDS OF VUNERABLE AND ELDERLY U.K CITIZENS THAT ARE RECIEVING AND RESPONDING TO SCAM MAIL, 20/30/40 UP TO 100 SCAM LETTERS A DAY TO ONE VICTIM. A FORM HANDED IN TO THE DEPOT BY THE POSTMEN/WOMAN WOULD ENABLE HELP TO BE SENT OUT TO THOSE IN NEED. BILLIONS OF POUNDS IS SENT TO SCAMMERS EVERT YEAR.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
